0: We have a 52- or 53-week fiscal year that ends on the last Saturday in December. Fiscal years 2023 and 2021 were 52-week fiscal years; 2022 was a 53-
week fiscal year. Fiscal 2024 is a 52-week fiscal year. Our Consolidated Financial Statements include the accounts of Intel and our wholly owned and
majority-owned subsidiaries, which include entities consolidated under the variable interest and voting interest models. We have eliminated intercompany
accounts and transactions. We have reclassified certain prior period amounts to conform to current period presentation.
The preparation of Consolidated Financial Statements in conformity with US GAAP requires us to make estimates and judgments that affect the amounts
